remarks: Value of the simple/same ring evaluation map.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)
statement:
evl1fval.o $e |- O = ( eval1 ` R ) $.
evl1fval.q $e |- Q = ( 1o eval R ) $.
evl1fval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
evl1val.m $e |- M = ( 1o mPoly R ) $.
evl1val.k $e |- K = ( Base ` M ) $.
evl1val $p |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ A e. K ) -> ( O ` A ) = ( ( Q ` A ) o. ( y e. B |-> ( 1o X. { y } ) ) ) ) $.
$d B y $.
